answers.answer: I've been averaging 1-2 lbs a week.
I am 21 weeks and have gained 14 total  which is bang on for what the app says I should have gained :)  my doc doesn't seem concerned that I have gained to much so I am happy with it :)

Im 31 weeks and have gained around 18lb so far and the majority of this has been in the past 5/6 weeks, I would say I'm now gaining around a 1lb a week which is average apparently.I am not even worried about weight gain, so long as I know my baby is fine I would happily gain another 40lb, its just a number :0)

Thanks girls I don't mind gaining it's just I lost 5 stone prior to getting pregnant and still hAve bmi of 36 but I'm tall and carry weight well.it's just my doc doesn't want me to gain more then 10 to 15 pounds as I'm high risk for preeclampsia.
You will gain as much as your baby needs you to hun :0) im sure you will do just fine. Wishing you all the best for the remainder of your pregnancy!

question: Hey girls,I'm 25 wks just want to no how much weight hAve ye put on in 3rd trimester alone.up to week 25 and gained just 4 pounds.really happy with that as only gained in past 3 weeks.should I expect an awful lot more hitting 3rd trimester soon x
title: 3rd trimester
